short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Switch between production, fast ring or dev environments.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use this extension to switch between different environments for KWIZ products. This will allow your browser to switch between production, fast ring or development builds.

This will allow you to preview pre-release versions of our products before they hit the production servers.
